problem_text_cn: 如图,已知直线a∥b∥c,直线m、n与a、b、c分别交于点A、C、E、B、D、F,若AC=8,CE=12,BD=6,则BF的值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the known straight line a ∥ b ∥ c, the straight line, n and a, b, c intersect at points A, C, E, B, D, F respectively, if AC = N_0, CE = N_1, BD = N_2, Then the value of BF is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查的是平行线分线段成比例定理,熟知三条平行线截两条直线,所得的对应线段成比例是解答此题的关键
